messages.title: What is more important to you?
messages.content: You and your family's health or Gordon Brown? If you vote Labour, you're letting them close the A&E at Chase Farm Hospital and giving them the opportunity to downgrade the A&E at North Middlesex and Whittington Hospitals.

issues.health: If you vote Labour, you're letting them close the A&E at Chase Farm Hospital and giving them the opportunity to downgrade the A&E at North Middlesex and Whittington Hospitals.

images.caption: Vote for Andrew Charalambous Your Conservative Parliamentary Candidate for Edmonton

leaflet.additionalNotes: If this happens you will need to get 3 buses and travel for about 1.5 hours to get to your nearest A&E. You decide on 6th May!
